settings.title: I design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.

settings.exad_heading_title: Hi, I'm Alif. Nice to meet you.
settings.exad_heading_subheading:
From the begining, i worked as a Chief Technology Officer of a media brodcasting company, Forecast ltd, collaborated with many talented people to create 
websites with more than 20 responsive pages with animations and other. I've done remote work for agencies, also developed projects for my ownself. I'm confident, passionate and eager to work on projects to complete it in due time.

settings.ekit_heading_extra_title: A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradise

settings.ekit_icon_box_description_text: Creating websites that adapt and display properly on various devices.
Structure websites in a way that improves search engine rankings and enhances organic visibility.
Mastering the fundamental languages used in web development to create and style.
Proficiency in using developer tools to debug and test websites for issues.
Basic design skills and awareness of user experience principles to create visually appealing interfaces.
The ability to optimize website performance by reducing load times, improving page speed.
